oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows admin to manage data in the key vault
Allow the app to read the signed-in users files.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allow the app to read your files.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allow the application to access the API on behalf of the signed-in user.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allow the application to access the API on your behalf.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allow the application to read data from the API.
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allow the application to read data from the API on your behalf.
